entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -24.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
